author: Steve Johnson
comment: Fails on my idol 3 paired with a zw2. I'm guessing it's not meant for non asus phones? I haven't been able to get any of the free remote camera apps to work, which sucks because it's one of the features I was really looking forward to in a smart watch.
title: Doesn't work

author: sheng ah
comment: I was unhappy for the android wear updare 1.5 to 2.0 on my new asus zenwatch 3 after i bought it for 5day. Now after the update some of the features like ZenWatch manager, zenwatch remote & facedesign cannot be install to the watch. Cannot copy google account to watch, therefore play store on watch doesn't work. Eventhought google play music doesn't exit anymore on the watch. New gorgeous watch because an update felt like less features..... Pls fix this matter asap.  If not the watch not worthy for me any more. Fed up with this problem.

author: Duane Hooper
comment: Does not work on Pixel phone. All pictures come out black. Reinstalling didn't fix the problem. I allowed all requests for access.  Too bad - It used to work really well on an older phone.

author: John Vincent Dantes
comment: Used to work but after the update. It's no good. Im using a s7 edge +

author: Quintin Foy
comment: Does not start, saying it can't find the watch. But the watch is connected to the phone and works otherwise. Help.

author: Parth Mewara
comment: Used to work fine... now crashes with my Zenwatch 3... really embarrassing and worthless.. fix it ASAP

author: Aleksi Kröger
comment: The app is unable to connect with the watch. It worked fine few times, but now it never works. When it worked, it was nice and easy to use.

author: Alvester Garnett
comment: It doesn't work on my Asus ZenWatch 3 paired to a Pixel XL phone. It will open on the watch and even auto-launch a corresponding camera app on the phone but the watch screen is just black with a camera icon. The camera app that it does open on the phone is not even the default Pixel/Google camera app though.

author: Jimmy Roberts
comment: MUST INSTALL ON PHONE FIRST! With Wear 2.0 you install on phone first, then open play store on watch. Scroll to bottom and you will find it listed under your phone apps and you can install from there.  Works great BTW!

author: Mohamad Irvan
comment: I'm using Asus Zenwatch 2 and Asus Zenfone Selfie, it didn't work at all. It says "Unfortunately the remote camera has stopped" please fix it.

author: Tony Huang
comment: It appears that this app has been abandoned by Asus. Last update was last December and this stopped working after wear 2.0 came out.

author: Tom Miller
comment: Doesn't work on pixel. Video recording crashes the app every single time, photos come out black

author: Jake Engdahl
comment: Reviews are bad but it works perfect for me between my Nexus 6P on 8.1 and ZenWatch 2 an AW 2.8

author: John Murray
comment: App does not work, just got my Asus zenwatch 2 yesterday, and app does not work with phone. Please fix

author: M. K.
comment: Does not see watch. Reboots for phone and watch done several times. Nothing, Nada. No response from the makers of this app. Shame...

author: Georgios Papageorgiou
comment: As an app is awesome but many important things missing for instance camera settings, I put 3 stars for that I'll make it 5 once these settings are applicable

author: Robert Chapman
comment: Doesn't work on watch keeps saying wait for watch to respond but it never does I uninstalled it.

author: Drew
comment: Does not work with Pixel and ZenWatch 2.  Photos come out black with no apparent fix.

author: Lydia Gohmann
comment: Same issues as the rest. Crasses and won't connect to my phone. Two thumbs down

author: Chris Donabedian
comment: Asus Zen Watch 2 + Google Pixel XL 128g.     It doesn't work - it takes pics ( black screen only )  How's that helpful ?    Why do so many things NOT work on the Google Pixel XL ?

author: Neil Dillon
comment: Works great. Would be nice to have option to turn off the phone screen. On Zenwatch 2, 1.63"

author: Joe Forte
comment: Won't work with pixel and a ZW2. Pictures come out black screen

author: Chason S
comment: App doesn't recognize that my watch is paired with the phone, even though they clearly are (notifications, weather, calls etc all work just fine)

author: David Buras
comment: Before Wear 2.0 the app worked perfect with my Zenwatch 2 and LG G3. Now with the upgrade, it doesn't work at all. Please fix. Thank you in advance.

author: Todd Bules
comment: Works well on the Galaxy S7 Edge.  One small suggestion, if you use the viewfinder on the watch you could save the battery on the phone if you could toggle the phone screen off.  Currently that feature isn't available.

author: Jimmie Giardina
comment: It opens the camera app on my phone, but will not take photos or display on watch.  Nexus 6p and Asus Zenwatch 3.  Control buttons do show on watch screen.

author: Nicholas Mrak
comment: only thing that I would like to see is being able to use the stock camera app on my nexus 5x to use the  remote shutter

author: Matt Thomas
comment: No longer works. Loved this app with my LG V10, but since upgrading to the V20, I can no longer see what the smartphone camera sees on my ZW2.

author: Pete M
comment: Previous version works fine, after updating this app no longer links properly with asus watch and ASUS phone.

author: Terry Lobo
comment: The watch app did not load on my Zenwatch 3 when I downloaded from PC Play Store. However, when I downloaded using Zenwatch Manager on my phone both phone and watch apps installed.

author: steven Hull
comment: Not used it a lot but when I have I've had no problems with it, it working well and its quite a cool add on to the watch

author: Wright Way Computers
comment: I would like to see the ability to store to sdcard and a way to change the quality of the pics and video, to maximize the HD quality obtainable.
title: Wish I could change quality and storage location

author: mike m
comment: app is junk.  no QA done.  doesn't work on Pixel &  ZenWatch 3
title: paring device not found

author: Mohd Rafai
comment: Worst, swicth selfie camera doesn't work

author: Brice Turner
comment: Moto Z with Asus just says device not paired or opens briefly before crashing with connection error.

author: Filipe Governa
comment: Doesn't work properly with Pixel and ZenWatch 3.

author: SparkySparks
comment: Wont work at all
title: Doesnt work

author: Nicholas Reith
comment: Keeps saying 'no watch detected'

author: Richard Moyer
comment: Works as it should on ZTE axon 7 mini with the zenwatch 2,  seamless capture and can be pretty far from to and still take pictures

author: Robert Paraiso
comment: Camera quality is interior to default phone camera. I'm using ZC553KL.
